Teddy meets a friendly robot named Robby who offers to help him on his journey.
Robby uses his advanced technology to guide Teddy through the wilderness.
Along the way, they encounter a group of wild animals who are afraid of Teddy.
Robby uses his technology to create a scary story about Teddy to make the animals afraid.
Teddy and Robby continue on their journey and eventually find a new home.
